info.description: this is a story that takes place either before, during, or after the Matrix series. try not to kill the main character or else if you have to make it look good. if something is wrong with the story, say someone placed something inappropriate or wrong i will alter it. also no rascist remarks even though i will be ok with problems between two or more people.
